step_data.thought: I received a timeout error when trying to click the 'Bicycle (OSRM)' option directly. This is likely because the option elements inside a select/combobox aren't directly clickable in the same way as regular elements. Instead, I should use the select_option action which is specifically designed for selecting options from dropdown menus. Looking at the accessibility tree, I can see the combobox has BID '166' and I want to select the 'Bicycle (OSRM)' option. After selecting this option, I'll need to click the 'Go' button (BID '171') to get the cycling directions.
